content: over both the red and white tail ends here now to save having to sew them in after row 15 in white - single_crochet around 20 stitches row 16 a straight edge half_double_crochet in each single_crochet around 20 half_double_crochet join with a slip_stitch row 16 b wavy edge slip stich into the next stitch then *skip 1 stitch 5 half_double_crochet in the next stitch skip one stitch slip_stitch in next stitch* repeat around you should have 5 little frills on the bottom the last slip_stitch is also the final join in the work bind bind off and secure the white thread hide the end of the yarn in the work hat tip to add the fluffy pompom or bell use the magic_ring red thread to tie it to the tip of the hat shape flatten the hat so that the red/white colour change jog is in the corner of the hat fold the hat tip over and stitch it securely to the side of the main hat hang if you want to add a thread to hang the hat from you can  crochet 25-30 chains and tie to the top of the work  simply tie a thread of unworked yarn at the top  use your favourite christmas ribbon criss wall https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/all-in-one-christmas-hat-ornament criss wall https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/all-in-one-christmas-hat-ornament
